korean: 어떤 걸 살까 한 시간 동안 고민했는데 결국 생필품만 샀다.
쿠폰을 최대한 활용하려고 금액을 맞추느라 애먹었어.
5천 원짜리 쿠폰은 3만 원 이상 구매해야 쓸 수 있더라고.
그래서 원래 계획보다 더 샀지만 어차피 쓸 거니까 괜찮아.
쿠폰 덕분에 만원 정도 아낀 것 같아서 기분이 좋다.
원래 가격 주고 사는 게 손해 같은 기분이 들어.
다음에 또 쿠폰이 들어오면 바로 써야지.
유효기간 지나서 날리는 건 정말 아깝거든.
친구는 쿠폰 모으는 거 귀찮다고 안 쓴다던데, 이해가 안 돼.
이런 작은 절약이 모여서 큰돈이 되는 거잖아.
english: Today is the day to use the coupons I've been saving up.
The coupon expiration date was tomorrow, so I had to hurry.
I spent an hour thinking about what to buy, but ended up just getting essentials.
You know, necessities like toothpaste, shampoo, and detergent.
I had a hard time matching the amount to get the most out of the coupons.
The 5,000 won coupon required a purchase of over 30,000 won.
So I bought more than I originally planned, but I'll use it anyway, so it's fine.
I feel good because I saved about 10,000 won thanks to the coupons.
The feeling of getting a discount is really great.
It feels like a loss to pay full price.
Next time I get coupons, I'll use them right away.
It's honestly such a waste to let them expire.
My friend says collecting coupons is too bothersome and doesn't use them, but I don't understand.
These small savings add up to big money, you know.
